The woefull and lamentable wast and spoile done by a suddaine fire in S. Edmonds-bury in Suffolke, on Munday the tenth of Aprill. 1608
[14] p.
Printed [by E. Allde] for Henrie Gosson, and are to be solde in Pater-noster rowe, at the signe of the Sunne, London : 1608.
Printer's name from STC. Woodcut title vignette. Signatures: A-B⁴ (-B4, blank?). Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
